about.title: About Me
about.bio: My name is Sophia Pachilis and I'm from Baltimore, Maryland. I'm a current junior at Boston College studying Computer Science with a minor in Japanese. My main interest in computer science is web development or game development, something more front-end based. In my free time I enjoy lifitng weights and building legos.

clubs.title: Campus Activities Board
description: Coordinator for the Campus Engagement Branch
In charge of planning, managing, budgeting, and running events on the Boston College campus
Some events I've planned:
Flower Bouquets- hundreds of flowers were ordered for the student body to hand-craft bouquets in anticipation of parents' weekend
Boo Bags- surprise bags of Halloween goodies that you could send to your friends to be anonomously left at their door step
Christmas market- Gingerbread house competition, hot cocoa, candle making, cookie decorating and more all in a themed space with Christmas music

projects.title: Python Tutorial Website
projects.description: This project was created during the Boston College Hackathon in Fall 2023.  It was a collaborative project with the theme of education. My group and I had 24 hours to create an educational computer science project. We decided to make a python tutorial website. I was in charge of the homepage while the other group members made the tutorial pages.

projects.title: Arduino Car Programming
projects.description: This project involved coding a robotic car to drive around using a remote. This was a collaborative project with a lab group. We coded in C using the Arduino software, and used the app Dabble to connect via Bluetooth to the robot. Our robot's name was Wall-E. Pictures are below!
